reference: Packer, Frank, 2000, The Disposal of Bad Loans in Japan: The Case of CCPC, in Crisis and Change in the Japanese Financial System. Takeo Hoshi and Hugh Patrick, eds. Boston, Mass.: Kluwer Academic Publishers, pp. 137-57.
